titles.title: Encouraging the United States Secretary of State to work with the Government of Pakistan to secure the return to the United States of all American children being educated in madrassas in Pakistan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
7/10/2008--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State should work with the government of Pakistan to identify and return to the United States all American children currently being educated in madrassas in Pakistan.
